summary: Arrows and bolts have one scripted weight value that you can customize via a SkyUI menu.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b][u]Overview[/b][/u][/color]

It\'s a simple mod that adds a customizable weight value to all arrows and bolts. It can be configured from 0.1 to 1 and can be activated/deactivated at any time. 

The mod is deactivated by default.

[color=yellow][b][u]Install/Uninstall/Update[/b][/u][/color]

This mod requires no DLC, but it requires [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]Sky UI[/URL].
	
To install, place all the files into your ...Skyrim\\Data folder.
You will have to activate the mod through the Sky UI menu.

To uninstall, deactivate the mod through the SKY UI menu and delete the mod\'s files (BSA and ESP).

To update from a previous version, you just ovewrite the old files with the new ones. No clean save/install required.


[color=yellow][b][u]Compatibility[/b][/u][/color]

Compatible with every other mods.
Note for modders : arrows and bolts added with the Keyword \"VendorItemArrow\" will be counted.

[color=yellow][b][u]Issues[/b][/u][/color]

[list]
[*]None
[/list]
[color=yellow][b][u]My other mods[/b][/u][/color]
